@package game
@version 0.1.0.0


module HallOfFame

-- | Function that append a score to a high scores textfile.
saveScore :: Int -> IO ()


module Reading

-- | Function that provides a valid input of guessing number
readUntilValid :: IO Int


module GamePlay

-- | Function that makes one turn of a gameplay.
gamePlay :: Int -> IO Int

-- | Main function that provide whole gameplay.
game :: Int -> IO ()

-- | Function that calculates a change of score.
change :: Int -> Int -> Int
